short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Bookmark sites, images, and videos to a gallery. Supports downloading videos from most sites.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows you to bookmark your favorite sites, images, and videos. Instead of keeping a long list of unorganized bookmarks, you can add them to a visually appealing and navigable gallery. Simply open the context menu on a webpage, an image, or a video to bookmark it. Add tags to your bookmarks and quickly find them through a simple search interface. You can also download videos you bookmark. Most videos can be downloaded. Due to chrome store policy, youtube videos cannot be downloaded, although they can still be bookmarked.
